symbol
  1. A non-spacing symbol placed over a word or phrase of the Bible to indicate that presence of a Masoretic note in the margin.

character
  1. See nikud point schwa. See also שווא.

character
  1. The niqqud point ḥataf segol. See also חטף סגול.

character
  1. The niqqud point ḥaṭaf pataḥ. See also חטף פתח.

  1. The niqqud point hiriq. See also חיריק.

character
  1. The niqqud point tzere. See also צירי.

character
  1. See niqqud point segol. See also סגול.

character
  1. See niqqud point ḥolam. See also חולם.

character
  1. See nikud point kubutz. See also קובוץ.

character
  1. dagesh, used to denote a geminated consonant, or a consonant pronounced as a plosive as opposed to as a fricative.
  2. mappiq or mapiq, used to indicate that the letters ה (he) or א (aleph) are to be pronounced as consonants in positions where they usually indicate a vowel.
  3. shuruk sign, used with ו (waw/vav) to indicate the long u vowel sound.

suffix
  1. -ian, -eer: Denoting a profession or occupation.
  2. Used in forming adjectives related to a profession or occupation.
  3. Used in forming taxonomic orders.

postp
  1. (no longer productive) to, toward, in the direction of, -ward
  2. (colloquial, no longer productive) at, located in the direction of

pron
  1. (archaic) her, it: indicates the direct object of a verb
  2. her, it: indicates the object of a preposition
  3. (now formal) her, its: indicates the possessor of a singular construct noun

suffix
  1. used in feminine singular forms of most adjectives
  2. used in singular indefinite and definite forms of many or most feminine nouns
  3. used in feminine singular present participle and present tense forms of certain verbs
  4. used in third-person feminine singular past tense (suffix conjugation) forms of most verbs
  5. used to add emphasis to certain future-tense and imperative verb-forms

pron
  1. him, it: indicates the object of a preposition
  2. (now formal) his, its: indicates the possessor of a singular construct noun

suffix
  1. Indicates the masculine plural in the third person of the past tense.
  2. Indicates the masculine plural in the second and third person of the future tense.
  3. Indicates the masculine plural in the imperative.

suffix
  1. A suffix indicating a periodical or a journal.
  2. A diminutive suffix.
  3. A suffix indicating collections.
  4. A suffix indicating tools.
  5. A suffix used in words indicating order.
  6. A superlative suffix.
  7. -um; used in borrowing certain European words that end in -um or one of its cognates.

suffix
  1. -ness, -ity, -ism, -hood: a suffix forming nouns, especially abstract nouns, from adjectives and other words.
  2. The plural ending for most feminine and a few masculine nouns (regardless of state).
  3. The feminine plural ending for adjectives (regardless of state).
  4. The feminine plural ending for present-tense and present-participle forms of verbs.
  5. (rare) Appended to two masculine nouns denoting men, forming feminine counterparts denoting women or females.

suffix
  1. Used in adjectives with the meaning “related to”. Used as a translation of -ic
  2. Forming from place names nouns with the meaning “person related to”.
  3. My, of mine, me (one suffix form of the first-person singular personal pronoun).
  4. (by extension) -ie, -y Forming diminutive or affectionate forms of nouns or names.
  5. Forming the plural construct form of a word, i.e. the construct form of ־ים.

suffix
  1. A theophoric suffix, meaning "the Lord", used in many Biblical proper names

suffix
  1. his, its (indicates that a noun pluralized with ־ִים (-ím) is possessed by a third person singular possessor)

suffix
  1. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see ־ִי, ־וּת.

suffix
  1. For most masculine nouns and certain feminine nouns, forming plural non-construct forms from corresponding singulars.
  2. Forming certain pluralia tantum.
  3. For all or nearly all adjectives, forming masculine plural forms from corresponding singulars.
  4. For all or nearly all verbs, forming masculine plural present participle and present tense forms from corresponding singulars.

suffix
  1. For masculine singular adjectives in ־י (-í), replacing that ending to produce feminine singular forms.
  2. Appended to certain masculine nouns denoting men, forming feminine counterparts denoting women or females.
  3. Appended to certain masculine nouns denoting large items, forming feminine counterparts denoting corresponding small items.
  4. Forming proper nouns denoting languages (identical to feminine singular adjectives).
  5. Forming words describing vehicles.

suffix
  1. -logy: a combining form, forming nouns that denote fields of learning.

pron
  1. them: indicates the direct object of a verb.
  2. them: indicates the object of a preposition.
  3. them: indicates the possessor of a noun in the construct state.

suffix
  1. With the characteristic being a behavior or personality trait.
  2. With the characteristic being a profession or other activity.
  3. With the characteristic being something else.
  4. -ium: forming names of chemical elements.

suffix
  1. (added to nouns) -nik, -er: Denoting persons by membership, occupation or attribute.

character
  1. The niqqud point rafe. See also רפה. Mainly used in Yiddish text to indicate the absence of a dagesh kal.

symbol
  1. (biblical) A particular cantillation mark: where it appears, it follows a word that has what is normally a conjunctive mark and makes it disjunctive.

punct
  1. (chiefly biblical) Used to signify the end of a passage, such as a verse from Scripture.

symbol
  1. (biblical) A Masoretic notation of unclear significance.

character
  1. Aleph or alef: the first letter of the Hebrew alphabet, coming before ב.

noun

character
  1. (Hebrew with niqqud) A variation of the consonant א (“aleph”), using kamatz to indicate a specific ancient vowel, approximately /ɑ/.

prep
  1. Indicating the destination of movement.
  2. Indicating the second end-point of a range or interval.
  3. Indicating the recipient of a transfer.
  4. Indicating the addressee of an utterance.
  5. Indicating the beneficiary of an action.
  6. Indicating the person or thing affected by an action.
  7. Introducing an ethical dative, especially after a verb of motion.
  8. Used with a form of הָיָה (hayá).
  9. Used with יֵשׁ (yesh) or (for non-possession) אֵין (ein).
  10. (now rare) Used as a bare predicate, with no copula.
  11. Used with another verb, indicating the possessor of another object of the verb.
  12. To, into; indicating a result.
  13. Indicating the result of a transformation.
  14. For, according to, in the opinion of; indicating the holder of a viewpoint, or the source of a claim.
  15. Indicating the theme of an impersonal verb or other impersonal predicate.
  16. Of; indicating the reference-point relative to which a direction may be specified.
  17. Of, to, before: indicating the hour before which a number of minutes or fraction of an hour is specified.
  18. (by extension, slang) Before: indicating the number of years before which a fraction of a year is specified.

root

column2:
verb
  1. To fall: to be pulled downward by gravity.
  2. To fall: to decline sharply.
  3. (flowery) (constructed with מ־) To be less the someone or something else.
  4. To be dropped
  5. (computing and electronics) To crash, to suddenly or expectedly stop working.
  6. To occur, to fall (on a certain day of the week, date, or similar); said of an instance of a recurring event such as a holiday or date.
  7. To fall (into a category or a domain), to come under, to be included.
  8. (slang) (constructed with על־) To happen upon, to stumble upon, to meet someone unexpectedly.
  9. (slang)
  10. (by extension of physically falling) To fall, to die especially in battle.
  11. To fall, to suffer defeat, ruin or distraction.
  12. (biblical) To reside, to dwell, to settle.
  13. (biblical) To attack, to start a battle (to apply violent force).
  14. To be captured (in a trap or an ambush, etc.)
  15. To be seized by force or stratagem, to be captured, to fall into the hand of others.
  16. To be decided.

adj
  1. (modern) wonderful, superb, excellent, great
  2. (chiefly Biblical Hebrew) inexplicable, inconceivable, source of amazement

verb
  1. To be injured, to get hurt: to receive an injury, to become injured.

noun

  2. slaughter, butchery, massacre (the killing of many people)

noun
  1. A (male) swimmer: a (male) person who swims, especially one who participates in swimming competitions.

noun
  1. A (male) player: a (male) person who plays or is playing a given game or sport.
  2. A (male) actor: a (male) person who performs in a theatrical play or film, or on television.

noun
  1. A female player: a woman who plays or is playing a given game or sport.
  2. An actress: a woman who performs in a theatrical play or film, or on television.

noun
  1. (countable and uncountable) Release, a release, an act of releasing.
  2. (specifically) Release, a release: the releasing or freeing of a prisoner.
  3. (specifically) Release, a release: the releasing of a drug into a patient.
  4. Nirvana.
  5. Emancipation: a granting of new freedoms or rights to a people or group that were previously denied them.
  6. A blackbird, a common blackbird, a Eurasian blackbird: a member of the species Turdus merula.

  1. Used after truncations of single words.

symbol
  1. Double apostrophe, used to form Hebrew acronyms, as in ארה״ב and תנ״ך.
  2. Used in a number written as multiple letters.
  3. (obsolete) Used by some authors for emphasis.
  4. Often used in writing out the names of letters, such as וי״ו.
